verses.roman:
mātā more putra-bhāve karena bandhana
atihīna-jñāne kare lālana pālana

synonyms: mātā—mother; more—Me; putra-bhāve—in the position of a son; karena—does; bandhana—binding; ati-hīna-jñāne—in thinking very poor; kare—does; lālana—nourishing; pālana—protecting.
translation: "Mother sometimes binds Me as her son. She nourishes and protects Me, thinking Me utterly helpless.
